channel.title: Notices on Manual
channel.description: Recent content in Notices on Manual

item.title: Adding and Editing Notices
item.description: Adding and Editing Notices Path to Add a New Announcement: Notices > Notices Manager and then click Add New Notice or Notices > Add New Notice. Path to Edit or Delete an Announcement: Announcements > Announcement Manager and then click either Edit or Delete The Notices Manager provides controls to create and edit notices for your site, and to set up criteria for when each notice should appear. The top part of the page deals primarily with the text and HTML tagging, while the bottom of the page sets up the display criteria.
